EmailTemplate.name: Reports trial
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for your interest in the Reports module.
Reports is a licensed module available in IXM WEB, which along with Invixium biometric devices helps enterprises and businesses to prevent time theft and improve workforce productivity by generating up to 17 types of reports.
The key to begin your 30 day trial is given below:
<Enter License Key>
For any other queries, feel free to contact us at support@invixium.com or +1 844 INVIXIUM (468 4948).
Thank you for choosing Invixium!
Enjoy the experience!
Best Regards,
Invixium Support Team
Contact US : +1 844 INVIXIUM (468 4948) Email : support@invixium.com
Work Hours : 12:00AM to 5:00PM (Eastern Time) Skype : invixium_support
{!Case.Thread_Id}
This email and any attachments may contain confidential and privileged information. If you have received this message in error, please notify us immediately and destroy the material in its entirety, whether electronic or hard copy. Also, please consider the environment before printing this email.
